TransactionStateContext.ParticipationState: When users call becomePlayer and deposit 0.02 ether to join the game, they enter the 'players' list.
TransactionStateContext.ManipulationState: When players call manipulateSecret and provide 0.01 ether, attempting to unlock the secret.

ExternalInteractions.description: Sends ether to an external address, firstTarget.
Sends ether to an external address, secondTarget.
Transfers the contract's entire balance to the winner address.
Sends a small amount of ether (1 wei) to the owner using call.
